org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks
Interface FileMakeDirSpec

All Superinterfaces:
FileBrowserTaskSpec, FileTaskSpec, TaskSpec
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFileMakeDirSpec
public interface FileMakeDirSpec
extends FileBrowserTaskSpec

Describes a make directory task to perform. The make directory task will create a directory with the specified name in the specified (parent) directory location.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getDirectoryName()
          Returns the name of the new directory to create.
 FileLocation getParentLocation()
          Returns the parent location of the new directory to be created.
 void setDirectoryName(java.lang.String dirName)
          Returns the name of the new directory to create.
 void setParentLocation(FileLocation location)
          Sets the parent location of the new directory to be created.
